description: This file is a test utility module for rendering React components within a memory router environment, primarily used in testing scenarios with React Testing Library. It sets up a router context with optional route configurations and ensures global UI providers like ToastProvider are available during tests.

methods.name: renderWithRouter( element, { initialEntries = ["/"],  routes, } = {} )
methods.description: A utility function that renders a React element within a memory router context for testing purposes. It supports initial route entries and custom route configurations, incorporating global providers like ToastProvider.
